items.title: Obesity Driving Chronic Conditions in Young People
items.description: Study adds to existing literature that shows damaging impact of obesity-related conditions on large portions of US population. Medscape Medical News

items.title: Hospitalists Must Encourage Mental Stimulation for Patients
items.description: Keeping patients’ brains sharp and active helps stave off delirium, improves outcomes in hospitals. Medscape Medical News
